docs.title: Xin chào! 👋
docs.text: I'm Truong Cong Dat Dodero, a passionate developer and tech enthusiast. Welcome to my personal website where I share my projects, thoughts, and experiences.

docs.title: What You'll Find Here
docs.text:
• 🚀 Projects I've worked on
  • 📝 Blog posts about tech and development
  • 👨‍💻 Information about my skills and experience
  • 📫 Ways to connect with me

Feel free to explore and get in touch!

docs.title: Who I Am
docs.text: I'm Truong Cong Dat Dodero, a developer with a passion for creating innovative solutions. I specialize in web development and software engineering.

docs.title: Diagram Example
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
    participant Alice
    participant Bob
    Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you?
    loop Healthcheck
        John->>John: Fight against hypochondria
    end
    Note right of John: Rational thoughts!
    John-->>Alice: Great!
    John->>Bob: How about you?
    Bob-->>John: Jolly good!

Công thức trong dòng
docs.text:
Einstein's famous equation: \( E = mc^2 \)

Pythagorean theorem: \( a^2 + b^2 = c^2 \)

docs.title: Ma trận
docs.text: \[ \begin{pmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{pmatrix} \begin{pmatrix} x \\ y \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} ax + by \\ cx + dy \end{pmatrix} \]
